desc: Draws a triangle on the screen.

args.name: x1
args.desc: The first x coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: y1
args.desc: The first y coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: x2
args.desc: The second x coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: y2
args.desc: The second y coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: x3
args.desc: The third x coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: y3
args.desc: The third y coordinate of triangle vector.

args.name: l
args.desc: (false/nil) The triangle will be filled, (true) The triangle will have only lines (outline).

args.name: c
args.desc: The color of triangle (0-15), defaults to the active color.

note: The arguments can be passed in a table
